transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji. Sun pa rahe hai mam meri aawaz aapko?
Executive: Ji haan, sun pa rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai. So, theek hai. So, mam matlab ye issue hai ki abhi tak bhi aapko genuine nahi mile. Wo jo ek do se baat hui hai, wo GST verified nahi hai.
Executive: Right.
Customer: GST haan, jis se bhi baat hui GST verified nahi hai. Radha construction karke hai, unse baat hui thi. Unhone bhi GST number nahi diya hai. Meeting ke liye bola hua hai, abhi tak meeting ka koi nahi aa raha hai filhaal. Mai waiting me hu, mujhe ye hai ki do chaar din me koi response aa jaye mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Digital marketing ka search kiya, usme mujhe aapko ek mila hai. Abhi unhone bola hai unse kuch detail leni hai, fir mai dobara phone karungi aapko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Mam, jaise aap bol rahe ho ki digital marketing ki aapko matlab jyada chahiye. So, digital marketing ke liye aapne search karke kabhi koi buylead dekhi hai?
Customer: Search karke. Specifically digital marketing search kari thi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Unse meri baat hui.
Executive: To abhi aap agar system pe hai, laptop hai, to abhi jaise maine yaha pe ek digital marketing services, haan yaha pe dala hai. To yaha pe kuch buyleads hai jaise Instagram marketing services, service provider in Delhi, Instagram marketing promotion services. Google ads campaign. Isko short mat kiya karo. Inko mai call kar rahi thi, mai aapko call nahi kar sakti. Jaise maine inko search kiya tha. Daily lead aati hai. To mai to kal 4:00 baje dekhungi.
Customer: Aur iske baad me sir aapko collaboration bhi hai.
Customer: Inka company ka naam ikko hai. Google ads campaign kabhi aapne dekha? Delhi online solutions LLP. Inse inka naam likha hua hai. Koi aise bhi company hogi. Jo dusre wale UP se aayi thi, Instagram collaboration, isme company ka naam nahi likha hua. To isko mujhe ye samajh me jo provide karte hai na, matlab ki jo seeker.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ho sakte hai.
Customer: Kyuki inka kahi kahi detail milegi company hai ya kuch aisa.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Wo to ho sakte hai kyuki wo to baat karne ke baad hi confirm hota hai ki kon hai. Hai na? Haan wo to baat karne ke baad pata chalta hai. Jisme company ka naam likha ho jo aapko lagta hai relevant buylead to wahi consult kare. But abhi aapne, haan but.
Executive: Hmm. So but abhi matlab finally aapki koi aisa deal ho chuki hai?
Customer: Mam aapne pehle batayi thi ki ek se aapki baat chal rahi hai. Wo wahi hai jin jin hone GST nahi diya aapko?
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Jab meri baat hui, wo wahi the? Isliye unse bhi nahi hui.
Customer: Isliye unse bhi nahi hui. Daily message aata hai. Phone phone nahi uthate. Do din se phone karenge to phone nahi uthate. Lekin message daal dete hai, subah baat karenge, subah baat karenge. Isliye maine baat kari thi. Unko hum daily reporting dete hai ki sir apna jo hai email id de dijiye. Hum aapko proposal jayega. Apna GST number de dijiye. To wo humko koi bhi proposal nahi de rahe hai. Ab unhone aaj fir bola hua hai shaam tak ki mai aapko provide kara dunga. Ab hum unse ek do baar baat karke na, yaad ho jayega.
Executive: Haan mam.
Customer: Abhi agar koi company hai to proper working me hai. To unke paas shuru hoga unke paas.
Executive: Hmm. Haan. Wo to hoga.
Customer: Radha construction bhi hai. Unhone bhi humko bola tha. Unhone bhi humko bola tha. Unhone bhi humko bola tha. Unhone bhi humko bola tha. Unhone bhi humko remind karwaungi ki kab karwayenge meeting.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai. Baki inke alawa koi aur issue hai?
Customer: Do hafte me mujhe yehi ki baat hui hai. Madam agar do hafte me mujhe do lead mili hui hai. Inme se mai dono se satisfy hu. Ek se agar mujhe positive mil jati hai. Tabhi mere liye aage service lena faydemand hota hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Tabhi to ye hai lekin hafte bhar me ek to milni chahiye. Hai na? Wo cheez hoti hai mam.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye bhi aap thoda dekhiye. Tab tak solution aane dijiye. Atleast ek to ho.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To mujhe us cheez se jo maine mujhe pata hai meri ye complaint hai jo proper chal rahi hai. Wo to close karwa do.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Matlab mam aapki na wo bahut jyada break ho rahi hai. Mai totally samajh nahi pa rahi hu. Abhi aapne kya bola?
Executive: Meri taraf se to bilkul bhi nahi hai. Aapki taraf se hi hai. Mai kya karu? Mai aapka number check karu?
Customer: Abhi final decision.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Abhi mam final.
Customer: Ji. Haan ji to madam aap socho. Agar mere whatsapp pe final aaye ki mere haath me to mai final kaise karu? Haath to time aapka hua hai. Ek ne bhi apna approval mujhe de diya na, ye ho jayega mai aapki final kar dungi. Complaint hai usko daal do.
Executive: Haan, theek hai. But ye abhi jo concern raise hai, ye close karni hai abhi ki nahi?
Executive: Nahi nahi madam wo jo daily concern close nahi karna abhi. Jab tak uska solution nahi milta, close nahi karna.
Executive: Theek hai. To aapko kab tak lag raha hai ki wo log agar approval denge to kab tak denge?
Customer: Aaj shaam tak bola hua hai.
Executive: Aaj shaam tak.
Customer: Aaj shaam tak. Theek hai. To fir mai wo, khatam ho jayega. Ye to khatam hone dijiye.
Executive: Thodi theek kijiye. Kya bol rahe hai?
Customer: Ji ji. Matlab to mam iske liye matlab kal fir aapse discussion karu. Agar unhone aaj approval diya ya nahi diya. Right? Agar unhone aaj approval de diya to meri khud hi call kar dungi mai aapko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Achha achha. Theek hai theek hai. Mai hi call kar dungi shaam ko. Theek hai to, achha achha. Theek hai. Mai agar ho jaata hai to mam achhi baat hai. But fir bhi mai uske liye confirm hai aur aapki problem hai nahi solve hoti to kuch to karna hi hai. To aap mujhe bataiyega. Aaj evening me agar approval aa jaata hai to call kar lijiyega. Otherwise mai kal morning me hi aapko call karungi. Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai madam. Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay mam. Aur koi issue hai?
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Hasn't received genuine buyleads, GST verification pending.

- Meeting not scheduled, awaiting response.

- Wants digital marketing buyleads.

- Complaint resolution pending.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues.

- Executive offered to check the customer's number.

- Executive will follow up tomorrow morning.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call if approval received today.

- Executive to call tomorrow morning if no approval.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, digital marketing, approval, follow up
